name: key
description: the key to the TOOL CABINET in the Cargo Hold.

name: component
fullName: a compatible Engine COMPONENT for your ship
description:
The Engine COMPONENT CWO2 Zhang requested in order to repair your ship.

Nice work!
usedDescription: You've given the COMPONENT to the Chief already.

name: tool
description: A HyperThermal Torch TOOL used to weld vacuum-hardened starship materials.
usedDescription: You've given the TOOL to the Chief already.

name: corpse
description: The Dead Captain's flight suit is drawn grotesquely taught in some places and hanging oddly loose in others due to the CORPSE rot.
usedDescription:
The Dead Captain's CORPSE lies bloated on the stretcher you pulled from the COOLER.
The smell is too much for you to push him back inside.

You feel guilty, from one Captain to another you apologize to the dead man.

name: keycard
description:
A security KEYCARD that grants access to a ship's Bridge.
A photo and some personal info about its owner are lasered onto it.
Seems his name was "Cpt. Malcolm Reynolds". The name conjures a forgotten memory in your mind...

name: manual
description: A Training MANUAL, depicting the proper use of the HyperThermal Torch TOOL in installing several types of Engine COMPONENTS.
usedDescription: You've given the MANUAL to the Chief already.

name: flamethrower
description:
A state-of-the-art weapon that allows stage adjustment for focused or wide area fields of coverage.
The oscillating muzzle modulator delivers an even coverage across the direction of flame.
usedDescription:
The tank is depleted! You'd have to find more butane to use it again. 
This is useless now.
